About Me

Director of machine learning @anchorblock.vc focusing on machine learning and blockchain-based product. Experience in building scalable machine learning software systems leveraging state-of-the-art models. Proficient in handling large scale vision and language models.

Machine Learning Research

Pytorch, Tensorflow, Anaconda, OpenCV, Latex, Pandas, Numpy

Scalable Product Development

C++, Python, Rust, Linux, Git, MySQL, Redis, MongoDB, Django, Docker, FastAPI, Nginx, PostGreSQL, Solidity, Polygon

Featured Projects

Hyperspectral Imaging

Hyperspectral imagery is a type of 3D remote sensing data, where there are 2D spatial information and 1D spectral signature. In this project, various novel solutions have been introduced for effective classification of hyperspectral imagery.

Check it out

Convex Optimization For Neural Network Training

A convex-optimization approach has been introduced considering the angular difference of current gradients y(t) and previous gradients y(t-1) with lagrange multiplier. Superior results have been achieved on multiple benchmark datasets including MNIST, CIFAR10, CIFAR100, and Imagenet 2012.
